resources.string: Mount Hutt is most popular mountain in the Canterbury area. The top is at an altitude of 2190m
Coronet Peak is the first commercial ski area in New Zealand. The top is at an altitude of 1651m
Cardrona is the largest ski area in New Zealand. The top is at an altitude of 1894m
Mt Ruapehu has two ski fields: Whakapapa and TÅ«roa. The top is at an altitude of 2797m
